EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Hey}}, Last Chance to Win Two Tickets to VMworld 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=VMworldSweeps&utm_content=07012016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Our 2nd round winner has been chosen! There is now only 1 chance left to win 2 Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2016 in fabulous Las Vegas! The epicenter of all things virtual, VMworld is our industry's biggest stage and we want to see you there. The final drawing will be on July 15th. Enter today for your chance to win! <[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=VMworldSweeps&utm_content=07012016" target="_blank" style="font-size: 12px;"> Good Luck! -The VMTurbo Team
